keys: Artes visuales. Tejidos y fibras. Plan de lección
resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81972</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4016</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Experimenting with Fabrics and Fibres</string>
            <string language="es">Experimentos con tejidos y fibras</string>
            <string language="ga">Tástálacha le Fabraicí agus Snáithíní</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren mit Geweben und Fasern</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérimentation avec des tissus et des fibres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimentar com as telas e as fibras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sperimentando con i tessuti e le fibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πειραματισμός με τα υφάσματα και τις ίνες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson ideas for encouraging children to experiment with different fabrics and to discover various informal ways of attaching them.</string>
            <string language="es">Ideas de lección para alentar a los niños a que experimenten con diferentes tejidos para descubrir varias formas informales de unirlos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaointe ceachta chun daltaí a spreagadh úsáid a bhaint as fabraicí difriúla agus chun bealaí neamhfhoirmiúla a aimsiú chun iad a cheangail.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales. Tejidos y fibras. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Fabric and Fibre</string>
            <string language="ga">Fabraic agus Snáithín</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionideen für die Anregung der Kinder, mit 
unterschiedlichen Geweben zu experimentieren und verschiedene formlose
Methoden der Befestigung sie zu entdecken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Idées de leçon pour encourager des enfants à 
expérimenter avec différents tissus et à découvrir de diverses 
voies sans cérémonie de les attacher.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idéias da lição para incentivar crianças 
experimentar com as telas diferentes e descobrir várias maneiras 
informais de uni-las.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idee di lezione per consigliare ai bambini 
sperimentare con differenti tessuti e scoprire i vari modi informali 
di fissaggio loro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιδέες μαθήματος για την ενθάρρυνση των παιδιών για να 
πειραματιστεί με τα διαφορετικά υφάσματα και για να ανακαλύψει 
τους διάφορους άτυπους τρόπους τους.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewebe und Faser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tissu et fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes Visuais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tela e fibra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti Visive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tessuto e fibra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ύφασμα και ίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
